name: /ess/config/dcm/control_param/min_customer_soc
description: Minimal customer SoC is used to calculate corresponding system soc threshold min_soc, should be between 0.0 and 1.0 including borders

name: /metrics/network/interface_report_request
description: Count of Network Interface Report requests

name: /net/wan1/state
description: wan1 (USB dongle ethernet adapter) interface state

name: /network/report/send
description: Trigger communicator to send a network interface report

name: /sys/devices/inverter/{index}/freqHz
description: Frequency in Hz dectected by the inverter

name: /sys/devices/inverter/{index}/i3phsumA
description: Sum of phase currents in A

name: /sys/devices/inverter/{index}/ltea3phsumKwh
description: Lifetime sum of 3-phase energy in kWh

name: /sys/devices/inverter/{index}/tHtsnkDegc
description: Temperature of the heat sink in 째C

name: /sys/devices/inverter/{index}/vln3phavgV
description: Average line-to-neutral voltage of 3-phase system in V

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/negLtea3phsumKwh
description: Negative lifetime sum of 3-phase energy in kWh

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/netLtea3phsumKwh
description: Net lifetime sum of 3-phase energy in kWh

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/posLtea3phsumKwh
description: Positive lifetime sum of 3-phase energy in kWh

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/q3phsumKvar
description: Sum of 3-phase reactive power in kVar

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/s3phsumKva
description: Sum of 3-phase apparent power in kVA

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/v12V
description: Voltage between phase 1 and 2 in V

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/v1nV
description: Voltage between phase 1 and neutral in V

name: /sys/devices/meter/{index}/v2nV
description: Voltage between phase 2 and neutral in V

name: /sys/devices/transfer_switch/{index}/sn
description: Serial number of the transfer switch

name: /sys/devices/transfer_switch/{index}/v2nGridV
description: Grid voltage between phase 2 and neutral

name: /sys/info/active_interface_mac
description: Current active network interface mac address

name: /sys/info/finance_type
description: Finance type for the site that this PVS is running at. Viable values are UNKNOWN, CASH, LEASE, and LOAN

name: /sys/pvs/flashwear_type_b
description: Percentage lifetime estimation as HEX value (0x01 = 10%, 0x9 = 90%). E.g. 0x1 means that 10% of the EMMC lifetime passed. This value holds current value for TYPE B cell.

name: /sys/pvs/usb_erase_count
description: SMART Attribute 229 Erase Count Usage which is a measurement to tell the health state of USB drive.
